page.title: 17RELIGION IN SHREWLEY
page.content: Several parishes have been joined under one priest.Church attendance has fallen in recent years possible due to changes in the social make-up of the area.At Haseley,where there used to be large numbers of estate workers, the church is virtually unused. Apart from the 3 churches at Hatton,Haseley and Rowington there is a independent chapel at Shrewley Commom. Methodists travelled to their church in Warwick. The Rev.Cannon of the 3 combined Anglican churches produces a parish magazine which acts as an organ for the discussion of local issues. It also reports local events such as the church garden party and gymkhana, and provides a diary of future local events including the fixtures of Rowington Cricket Club.
